mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT LPAD('┗', 6*(LEVEL-1)) || title as title, ROWNUM rn, b.BOARD_SEQ, b.CATEGORY_SEQ, b.CONTENT,b.DEL_YN,b.GROUP_SEQ,b.PBOARD_SEQ,b.REG_DT,b.REG_ID FROM BOARD b START WITH PBOARD_SEQ is null CONNECT BY PRIOR BOARD_SEQ = PBOARD_SEQ ORDER siblings by group_seq DESC) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 and #{page} * #{pageSize}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT LPAD('┗', 6*(LEVEL-1)) || title as title, ROWNUM rn, b.BOARD_SEQ, b.CATEGORY_SEQ, b.CONTENT,b.DEL_YN,b.GROUP_SEQ,b.PBOARD_SEQ,b.REG_DT,b.REG_ID FROM BOARD b where CATEGORY_SEQ=#{category_seq} START WITH PBOARD_SEQ is null CONNECT BY PRIOR BOARD_SEQ = PBOARD_SEQ ORDER siblings by group_seq DESC) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 and #{page} * #{pageSize}
select no_name from notice where no_seq = #{category_seq}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, category_seq=#{category_seq}, content=#{content}, reg_dt=sysdate where board_seq = #{board_seq}
update board set del_yn = 'Y' where board_seq = #{board_seq}
